did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, printed material and organizational records.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Letters and other papers relating to the Council.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Letters and other papers from the files of Edgar Heermance, Henry W. Hicock, and A.B. Recknagel, officers of the Council (1942-58); papers pertaining to the dissolution of the Council (1958-59); pamphlets and miscellaneous material relating to Council activities and the forest products industry (1942-59); and incomplete runs of WOOD NOTES and THE COUNCIL BULLETIN.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Northeastern Wood Utilization Council. Records, #1964. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: Related collection: Arthur Bernard Recknagel. Papers, #1891.
Related collection: Empire State Forest Products Association. Records, #1280.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial PDF finding aid.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
